MS MCQs

    Set up maintenance requests in Asset Management for Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

    »

    1. To view a summary of all maintenance requests in Asset Management, you can view which one of the following pages?

      Maintenance request types

      All maintenance requests

      Active maintenance requests

      Maintenance job types


    2. Maintenance workers can be assigned to maintenance requests by which of the following parameters?

      Purchase order number, work order pools, and item forecast

      Asset type, purchase order number, and Maintenance request types

      Asset type, Maintenance job type category, Functional location


    3. To configure responsible maintenance workers, you must first set up which of the following parameters on the Responsible maintenance workers page?

      Maintenance workers and lifecycle states

      Lifecycle models and lifecycle types

      Maintenance workers
